entity.name: Gavin Newsom
entity.description: Candidate for Governor of California Gavin Newsom

text: @GavinNewsom @GavinNewsom, are you paying attention? I was so proud back in March when you got in from of #COVID19 in #California, but I'm not proud now. I'm just afraid. Please re-institute a new #shelterinplace order NOW--before things get truly catastrophic. Please. We are counting on you.
